extensionDescription.message: Search selected text on Spotify, YouTube, YouTube Music, and Bandcamp.

feedbackText.message: We value your feedback! For bugs or suggestions, contact us at

feedbackThanks.message: Thank you for helping us improve!
feedbackThanks.description: Thank you message in the footer

searchOnSpotify.description: Search on Spotify context menu item

searchOnYoutube.description: Search on YouTube context menu item

searchOnYoutubeMusic.description: Search on YouTube Music context menu item

searchOnBandcamp.description: Search on Bandcamp context menu item

privacyPolicyTitle.description: Title of the privacy policy page

privacyPolicyHeader.description: Header of the privacy policy page

introductionText.message: Thank you for choosing Music Services Search. This Privacy Policy is designed to help you understand how our browser extension collects, uses, and safeguards your information. We take your privacy seriously and are committed to protecting your personal information.

informationCollectedIntro.message: The Music Services Search extension collects and stores the following information:
informationCollectedIntro.description: Privacy policy information collected intro text

informationCollectedServices.message: Your preferences regarding which music services you wish to enable (Spotify, YouTube, YouTube Music, Bandcamp)

informationCollectedSpotify.message: Your preference for using Spotify's web player or desktop application

informationStorageNotice.message: Important: This information is stored locally on your device using Chrome's storage sync API. It is not transmitted to our servers or any third parties.

howWeUseInfoHeader.description: Privacy policy how we use header

howWeUseInfoIntro.message: The preferences you set are used solely to:
howWeUseInfoIntro.description: Privacy policy how we use intro

howWeUseInfoItem1.message: Remember which music services you want to appear in your context menu
howWeUseInfoItem1.description: Privacy policy how we use item 1

howWeUseInfoItem2.message: Direct your music searches to either Spotify's web player or desktop application based on your preference
howWeUseInfoItem2.description: Privacy policy how we use item 2

howWeUseInfoOutro.message: We do not use this information for any other purpose, such as tracking, profiling, or advertising.
howWeUseInfoOutro.description: Privacy policy how we use outro
